name: Mad Swipe
description:
Can you handle the swiping madness?!

Swipe left, swipe right, swipe a perfect switch! Swipe and match falling objects into their notch to accumulate points before time expires. Get bonus points when you perfectly switch the notch to the correct object. It's a fast paced matching game that will challenge your eye-to-finger coordination to the edge of madness!

Help us test and improve Mad Swipe. Available now in Early Access stage on Google Play Store.
